text:
The YouTube publishing automation manages metadata creation, thumbnail processing, conditional logic for short and long videos, scheduled publishing, and status notifications.

Capabilities:
- Trigger-driven YouTube uploads.
- Formatter steps for titles, descriptions, tags, and categories.
- Thumbnail ingestion and transformation.
- Conditional branches for short-form (<2 min) and long-form content.
- Full API-driven upload and scheduling.
- Automatic logging and automated failure notifications.

This system significantly reduces manual labour and standardises output quality across MTDCNCâ€™s video publishing process.
